meanings: (사물이 주어) come to mind, occur to (one), (사람이 주어) call[bring] to mind, think of, flash upon (one), dawn upon (one), hit upon, be reminded of, remember
의견 말하기 An idea came to mind.
의견 말하기 A good idea flashed on me.
의견 말하기 A good idea dawned on me.
(사고, 사색) thought, thinking, (계획) idea, think, consider
(기억) (formal) remembrance, remember, look back on, bring[call] (sb/sth) to mind
(마음, 의지) (마음) mind, (의향) inclination, (의도) intention, think (of/about), intend, plan, mean, contemplate (doing)
